titleStmt.title: The fair dealer: or, A modest ansvver to the sober letter of His Excellency, the Lord General Monck; being a brief discovery of the meetest expedient, and most sovereign remedy for our present distempers. By the private hand of a gent. of Devon.
titleStmt.author: Trev., J.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: J. Trev., i.e. John Trevanion?.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
